description: TDD workflow hooks: enforces R-G-R cycle completion and prevents premature session end

hooks.prompt:
The tdd-implementer has finished a slice. Evaluate: $ARGUMENTS

Check if:
1. A failing test was written and confirmed RED
2. Implementation was written and confirmed GREEN
3. Refactoring was done (or explicitly skipped) and confirmed still GREEN
4. All three phases were completed with test output

If incomplete, respond {"ok": false, "reason": "Incomplete R-G-R cycle: [missing step]"}.
If complete, respond {"ok": true}.
